data.eml:eml: A new species of Valeria Stephens, 1829 (Lepidoptera, Psaphidinae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gyulai, Péter (2019): A new species of Valeria Stephens, 1829 (Lepidoptera, Psaphidinae) from Iran. Zootaxa 4695 (4): 394-396, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4695.4.8
